sections.heading: purposes, defined.Emergency purposes means any situation affecting the health and safety of a consumer

sections.text:
86-240.Emergency purposes, defined.

Emergency purposes means any situation affecting the health and safety of a consumer.

SourceLaws 1993, LB 305, § 4;R.S.1943, (1999), § 86-1204;Laws 2002, LB 1105, § 102.
